name: Candace Kane's Candy Factory
summary: Candie has just inherited her uncle's old candy factory and is trying to make her way to the International Candy Cup Championships. Working with Candie, you'll have to speedily create customized candy orders for each customer that enters your shop. Upgrade and customize the factory with special machines and gadgets. It won't be all sweet treats -- you'll also need to fend off rivals who attempt to sabotage your career.
